mapper.select: select quiznum, question, select1, select2, select3, select4, answer from quiz where quiznum = #{quiznum}
select scenenum, storynum, quiznum, nextscene1, nextscene2, nextscene3, nextscene4, fbexplain, storytext1, storytext2 from scene where storynum = #{storyNum} and scenenum = #{sceneNum}
mapper.insert: insert into fairytale ( storynum, storytitle ) values ( storynum_seq.nextval, #{storyTitle} )
insert into myselection ( selectionNum ,id ,storynum ,startdate ,enddate ,finished ) values ( selectionnum_seq.nextval , #{id} , #{storyNum} , sysdate , null , #{finished} )
mapper.select: select selectionNum from myselection where id = #{id} and storyNum = #{storyNum} and startdate = (select max(startdate) from myselection where id = #{id})
select * from ( select selectionNum, id, storyNum, startDate, endDate, finished from myselection where id = #{id} and storyNum = #{storyNum} and finished='N' order by startDate desc ) where rownum=1
select selectionNum, sceneNum, myAnswer, inputDate, item from selectiondetail where selectionNum = #{selectionNum}
select selectionNum, sceneNum, myAnswer, inputDate, item from selectiondetail where selectionNum = #{selectionNum} and scenenum = #{sceneNum}
select selectionNum, sceneNum, myAnswer, inputDate, item from selectiondetail join pagelist using(scenenum) where selectionNum = #{selectionNum} and pagenum = #{pageNum}
select pageNum from pageList where sceneNum = #{sceneNum}
select sceneNum from scene join pagelist using(scenenum) where pagenum = #{pageNum} and storynum = #{storyNum}
